thread.title: NASCAR drivers hilariously troll Jeff Gluck and his hats
thread.title_full: NASCAR drivers hilariously troll Jeff Gluck and his hats

title: NASCAR drivers hilariously troll Jeff Gluck and his hats
text: Mar 20, 2017 at 9:45a ET 0Shares Last week at Las Vegas, former USA Today reporter Jeff Gluck’s video of Kyle Busch attempting to punch Joey Logano after the Kobalt 400 went viral, appearing everywhere from TMZ.com to virtually every major television network that cares about sports. Gluck is out on his own now, running a website called, fittingly enough, JeffGluck.com. With his newfound celebrity, the subject of creating JeffGluck.com merchandise came up. There is no JeffGluck.com merchandise and Gluck said he doesn’t have any plans to create or market any. But that didn’t stop some high-profile trolling by NASCAR drivers and friends. Jasen Vinlove Jasen Vinlove-USA TODAY Sports Screen Shot 2017-03-20 at 9.43.16 AM
